title: Creative Content Assistant (Canva + Social Media + Design Trends)
salary: Php 20,000 - 35,000/ mo depending on experience and trial outcome
job_overview:
Job Description:
We’re Tru Creative — a cheeky, strategic marketing agency that believes even B2B brands deserve bold content.

We’re looking for a Creative Content Assistant who’s:

Sharp, forward-thinking, and aware of current social and design trends

Obsessed with clean design, Canva layouts, and visual storytelling

Able to design static and animated graphics for social media (especially Instagram and LinkedIn)

Bonus: Knows their way around tools for basic video edits to create reels and other short form video

Extra bonus: Has experience in e-commerce or interior design and understands visual merchandising or moodboard creation

This role is ideal for someone who loves marketing, has great taste, and wants to grow into a long-term creative role. We’ll start with a 2-week paid trial (part-time) and grow from there if it’s a great fit.
